com.dotmarketing.util

Class ServletResponseCharacterEncoding

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.ServletResponseWrapper
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponseWrapper
        • com.dotmarketing.util.ServletResponseCharacterEncoding
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse, javax.servlet.ServletResponse

    public class ServletResponseCharacterEncoding
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponseWrapper
    Ensures that the ServletResponse is properly encoded setting the character set whenever needed. Code based on JavaWorld Article by Mike Gavaghan http://www.javaworld.com/javaworld/jw-05-2004/jw-0524-i18n.html?page=4
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Mike Gavaghan, Dimitris Zavaliadis
